articles.title: Former Pumas star Aramburu killed in Paris
articles.description: Former Argentina rugby international Federico Aramburu has been shot and killed in Paris after an altercation in a bar.
articles.content:
Former Argentina rugby player Federico Martin Aramburu has been killed in Paris early on Saturday, he was 42.
The Paris prosecutor's office confirmed to the Associated Press that a murder investigation has been opened.

articles.title: Federico Martin Aramburu: Former Argentina rugby international killed in shooting in Paris
articles.description: Federico Martin Aramburu was capped 22 times and represented his country at the 2007 World Cup in France. Alongside his international appearances, Aramburu played for Biarritz, Perpignan, and Dax in the French league during his career.
articles.content:
Former Argentina rugby player Federico Martin Aramburu has been killed in a shooting in Paris.
Prosecutors told the Associated Press that a murder investigation had been opened after Aramburu died in the street, with shots having been fired.

articles.title: FIH Pro League: India lose 1-3 to Argentina in shoot-out
articles.description: India slumped to its third defeat in the FIH Pro League, losing 1-3 to Argentina in the shoot-out in the first leg match after both the teams were tied 2-2 at the end of the regulation time on Saturday.
articles.content:
India slumped to its third defeat in the FIH Pro League, losing 1-3 to Argentina in the shoot-out in the first leg match after both the teams were tied 2-2 at the end of the regulation time on Saturday.
